org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.gui.container

Class ScrollingGuiContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
      • net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiScreen
        • net.minecraft.client.gui.inventory.GuiContainer
          • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.gui.container.GuiContainerExtended
            • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.gui.container.ScrollingGuiContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiYesNoCallback, IButtonClickAcceptor<IButtonActionClient<GuiContainerExtended,ExtendedInventoryContainer>>, IButtonClickAcceptorClient<GuiContainerExtended,ExtendedInventoryContainer>, IValueNotifiable

    public abstract class ScrollingGuiContainer
extends GuiContainerExtended
    Gui for an inventory container that has a scrollbar and search field.
